channel.title: Comments on: Copyright and credits
channel.description: Exploring informed choice in the context of self-directed support for disabled young people in transition: A qualitative study

item.title: By: Fraser Mitchell
item.dc:creator: Fraser Mitchell
item.description: Dear Sonya I would be happy for you to use the link on your website. Regards Fraser
item.content:encoded:
Dear Sonya
I would be happy for you to use the link on your website.
Regards Fraser

item.title: By: Sonya Bewsher
item.dc:creator: Sonya Bewsher
item.description:
Dear Fraser,
I was wondering if it would be possible to share a link to your dissertation in our E-Bulletin on Friday. This bulletin goes out to 780 individuals who are interested in independent advocacy and issues which affect vulnerable people...self directed support being one of those issues.
Kind regards, Sonya Development Officer The Scottish Independent Advocacy Alliance
item.content:encoded:
Dear Fraser,

I was wondering if it would be possible to share a link to your dissertation in our E-Bulletin on Friday. This bulletin goes out to 780 individuals who are interested in independent advocacy and issues which affect vulnerable people…self directed support being one of those issues. 

Kind regards,
Sonya
Development Officer
The Scottish Independent Advocacy Alliance
